name: followers_by_username
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_bulk_profile_scrapper.
Tool description: Highly maintained and Stable Instagram Api. Scrap up to 200k Instagram profile per day. It's capable to handle high volume. Contact me for custom plans or requirements
API description: **Contact me for Custom package or requirements**

Fetch followers list

Carry forward nextMaxId to retrieve next batch

username.description: The Instagram username for which to fetch the followers.

corsenabled.description: A flag to enable CORS. Defaults to None.

nextmaxid.description: The ID to fetch the next page of results (used for pagination). Defaults to None.
